message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll love. Would you be interested in buying it for $18000?
I'm very interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand that $18000 is a bit steep, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. Would you be willing to consider $15000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $15000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I'm starting to think that we're getting close to a deal. I can do $14000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, let me know!

I really like the product, but $14000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $11000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
